name: Jiggy Bungus
description:
Use the meme generator to create a random meme and share it "online"

Controls:

- WASD or Arrow Keys to walk

- space, x, or j to jump

- c or k to interact with things

- certain sections use the mouse

Created by

- cyman: programming, audio

  • Tools: Love2d, Lua, Neovim, MilkyTracker, Audacity, sfxia

- Yecats: art

  • Tools: Paint.net

Please note: The memes generated are completely random and do not necessarily reflect the views of cyman or Yecats. We do not own any of the images that are used by the meme generator.
